column4: Microsoft reorganizes its financial results reporting
column5: Microsoft Corp said it was changing the way it reported financial results to reflect its emphasis on cloud and mobile businesses.

column4: UPDATE 1-Microsoft reorganizes its financial results reporting
column5: Sept 28 Microsoft Corp said it was changing the way it reported financial results to reflect its emphasis on cloud and mobile businesses.

column4: Microsoft reorganizes its financial results reporting
column5: Sept 28 Microsoft Corp said it would report revenue and operating income based on three segments  reorganizing the way it reports financial results.
